mapper.update: update hzs_file set file_old_name = #{fileOldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_new_name = #{fileNewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_suffix = #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_save_addr = #{fileSaveAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upload_id = #{uploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_name = #{uploadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_ref_flag = #{fileRefFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_reg_id = #{fileRegId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where hsf_id = #{hsfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select hsf_id, file_old_name, file_new_name, file_suffix, file_size, file_path, file_save_addr, upload_time, upload_id, upload_name, file_ref_flag, file_reg_id from hzs_file where hsf_id = #{hsfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select hsf_id, file_old_name, file_new_name, file_suffix, file_size, file_path, file_save_addr, upload_time, upload_id, upload_name, file_ref_flag, file_reg_id from hzs_file order by upload_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from hzs_file where file_reg_id = #{relationId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select hsf_id, file_old_name, file_new_name, file_suffix, file_size, file_path, file_save_addr, upload_time, upload_id, upload_name, file_ref_flag, file_reg_id from hzs_file where file_reg_id = #{relationId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by upload_time desc
